description: On Debian Linux, it installs 53% and hangs. I think I wasted a lot of good time, like more than an hour.
summary: On Debian Linux, it installs 53% and hangs

description: when installing via default GUI Ubuntu installer - the app "installs" but does not start when clicked "launch"

there's a compatibility issue with the version provided by the universal repository for some distribution of linux, but the newest version fix this issue .
you need to add the PPA of the app for getting the newest version . click on the left top little drawing, go into software and updates, then other software, then add
http://ppa.launchpad.net/taskcoach-developers/ppa/ubuntu . 
quit the windows "software and updates" , it should reload , and then download your app again , it worked for me .

I get this error (among others) when I try launching "taskcoach" from the terminal: 
/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/gtk-2.0/gtk/__init__.py:40: Warning: g_boxed_type_register_static: assertion 'g_type_from_name (name) == 0' failed
It did not launch. Other reviews stated that there is a fix, but I think it should be provided functional, and not depended on peer review found fixes. Instant uninstall.

+ groups / tree
+ print function
+ due & start date
+ categories
+ look and feel

The PPAs never update correctly, no matter how many hours I sink into trying to tweak the settings. I love this program, but it does not run on my version of Ubuntu. Yes, I should update my installation of Ubuntu - no I don't have the time to do that this month!
summary: I used to love this on Linux, now I'll run it on Windows

description: It's not worth downloading to have to uninstall it again. If the Devs read this, please fix I'm using Zorin.
Stable software with a wide range of features; I have been using this app for years.
summary: Good task manager for my GNOME desktop

summary: Crashes during start (Ubuntu 18.04 LTE latest updates)

description: Cuidado, no se que hace este programa!

Se tarda más tiempo en apuntar una tarea y marcarla como completada que en hacer la propia tarea. 
Nada más lejos de lo que una buena aplicación de anotación de tareas debe ser. Bolígrafo y papel siguen siendo mucho mejores que esta opción.
summary: Hace tantas cosas que es inútil

description: Rien, puisqu'elle ne s'est pas lancée...

Projet en cours de développement, et qui n'est pas complètement abouti. Il est prometteur parce que l'on peut exporter et importer des fichiers dans des formats variés (txt, html, ics, csv) ce qui permet une compatibilité avec beaucoup d'autres logiciels du même type. Il est en outre très paramétrable mais actuellement compte tenu de son niveau de développement son usage est fastidieux.
Выдало кучу ошибок gtk и не запустилось в итоге
